Title: The Good Samaritan
Plot: A navy dentist stops near the parked car to help a stranded motorist who pulls out a gun. The team investigates a murder with the help from a local sheriff, Charley, when they find out about a the similar murder of the Navy civilian employee in the was going through the nasty divorce,the wife is suspected but her alibi is perfect.
GuestStars: Stephanie Hodge, Heidi Dippold, Kate McNeil, Kirk B.R. Woller, Pancho Demmings, Sean McGowan
